title: Comparing Costs for Cloud-based Data Archives
abstract: Research data management is an expensive enterprise. Computing infrastructure for storing, retrieving, and preserving data is one area of expenses, and computing infrastructure costs grow as the size and number of datasets and demands for their retrieval grow. This paper compares the costs and performance of two database infrastructures, PostgreSQL and Elasticsearch, for digital data archives. We used benchmarking experiments and data from social media to estimate the costs of loading, indexing
